about.title: About Us
about.description: The William & Lily Foundation (WLF) is a philanthropic organization based in Indonesia established in 2009 to continue the philanthropic values of William and Lily Soeryadjaya. Since 2017, WLF has operated as a grant-making organization actively collaborating with various organizations at both national and local levels. Through this approach, WLF focuses on three key areas: early childhood development, basic literacy and numeracy, and economic empowerment.
